question: Can a peptide aptamer be used as protein inhibitor?
ideal_answer: Yes, peptide aptamers can be used as inhibitors.

snippets.text: Peptide aptamers of LIM-only protein 2 (Lmo2) were previously used to successfully treat Lmo2-induced tumours in a mouse model of leukaemia.
